heading: HB01227
0: AN ACT IMPOSING A MANDATORY AD VALOREM TAX ON IDLE LANDS AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTIONS TWO HUNDRED THIRTY SIX, TWO HUNDRED THIRTY SEVEN, AND TWO HUNDRED SEVENTY THREE OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991," AND APPROPRIATING THE FUNDS COLLECTED THEREFROM EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING FREE ACCESS TO PUBLIC HEALTH
